rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Investigation of his close contacts found no other cases, the NHC said. No other cases of human infection with H10N3 have been reported globally, it [the NHC] added.

rationale: The segment contains reassuring content but no high-potency verbs or metaphors.
